DisplayName: AUTO DISABLED Azure Portal Signin from another Azure Tenant
Description:
The alert rule was disabled due to too many consecutive failures. Reason: The query referred to a storage path that was not found. This query looks for sign in attempts to the Azure Portal where the user who is signing in from another Azure tenant,
 and the IP address the login attempt is from is an Azure IP. A threat actor who compromises an Azure tenant may look
 to pivot to other tenants leveraging cross-tenant delegated access in this manner.
